extendedInfo.description: Welcome dear tourist! Mind the gap (and the explosions) when leaving the plane...We wish you a pleasant stay in the world's most beautiful city. Paris by day or Paris by Night, discover 14 of the capital's most tourist-orientated and picturesque sites. In vehicles, each one more strange than the last, in the air or on the ground. You will have to visit, photograph, fight, explode, shoot, crush, burn, disintegrate, atomise... Not forgetting the inescapable gastronomic night out.One thing is certain, you won't get bored.PS: DeckEleven Travel does not accept any responsibility in the event of spontaneous combustion, abduction by aliens, or fortuitous death.

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: This is truly a game you\'ll want. Very polished overall, found no bugs myself, great graphics and sounds and top notch game play. Don\'t believe me? Get the free demo and I\'ll guarantee you\'ll want to buy the full version it\'s that addictive and as a bonus you get to blow up the French!! If you\'re English like me, you\'ll know how satisfying that is!
reviews.author: Terry Bungey

reviews.title: So fun
reviews.comment: Yes still updtated! Thanks to the devs!

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: It is made very well and is very challenging! The first few levels are fairly easy but get increasingly harder to beat. Im stuck on the Louvre level! Help?

reviews.title: Fun on a bun
reviews.comment: Awesome game...awesome name. You get to suck the life from people, glide around in an alien tank ,and fly a jet fighter. Lasers ,and missiles, and the look is polished. Fun fun fun.

reviews.title: Best game out there
